name: cameron
title: Budtender
coverLetter: I've been in the industry for 2 years now and I absolutely love it. being able to to combine both my love for cannabis, and video making into one thing is something I never thought I could do. its experiences like that push me forward to get advancing my career in the marijuana industry.
experience: Kushfly delivery service. broke down units into pre packaged jars. rolled cones daily. restock inventory. rosin pressing. videos for social media. package wax. package online orders. provide knowledge to customers about our products.
